original_text: Nebuzaradan the commander of the guard carried into exile some of the poorest people and those who remained in the city, along with the rest of the craftsmen and those who had deserted to the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 사령관 느부사라단이 백성 중 가난한 자와 성중에 남아 있는 백성과 바벨론 왕에게 항복한 자와 무리의 남은 자를 사로잡아 갔고

sentences.original_text: Nebuzaradan the commander of the guard
and those who remained in the city
along with the rest of the craftsmen
and those who had deserted to the king of Babylon
